predicate.note: Frames file for 'entrance' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1.

example.name: passive/adjectival
example.text: And, if still conscious at the evening's end, you notice something else: The audience, at first entranced and hypnotized by the music, releases its pent-up feelings in collective gratitude.

example.name: all args
example.text: John entranced Mary with his soulful rendition of ``I'm a Little Teapot.''
example.arg: his soulful rendition of ``I'm a Little Teapot.''
